name: Davutlu
description:
--- Davutlu ---

One night survival of a journalist who goes to the village of Davutlu, where paranormal events took place.

--- Controls ---

W-A-S-D to move.

Haunted objects move and make sounds by themselves. Just look haunted objects to disable them.

--- Team ---

Egehan Onel - Game Designer, Game Developer

Umut Gürdal - Game Developer

Zelal Deniz Yıldız - 2D Artist

#Erzurumlike
